title: Wolf Tooth add IS Premium Headsets for Specialized 42mm upper bearing diameters
content:
Wolf Tooth Components are now able to cater to Specialized mountain bike riders with their new IS Premium Headset for 42mm upper bearing diameters. Riders of almost all Specialized aluminium frame MTBs can now benefit from the upgrade, as can riders of a handful of their carbon frames such as the new Stumpjumper. Wolf Tooth [â€¦]

The post Wolf Tooth add IS Premium Headsets for Specialized 42mm upper bearing diameters appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
